title: Clear noon, moderate-speed city driving with a parked truck on the right.
caption: The ego vehicle drives down a city street with a parked truck on the right.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed, maintaining a safe distance from the parked truck on the right. Overall, the driver is focused on maintaining a safe and smooth journey through the city.
